statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT id, device_id, sensor_type, value, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = '87f88ce8-9a1d-4d4e-bdd0-ff005145d58e';
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id, sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING average_value > 30;
SELECT device_id, MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY total_readings DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, reading FROM sensors WHERE reading > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading FROM sensors WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM sensors s INNER JOIN devices d ON s.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.status = 'Active'
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type, reading, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type LIKE 'Temperature%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY device_name
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, reading FROM sensors WHERE reading BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY sensor_type
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_readings WHERE value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, timestamp, sensor_type, value FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT device_id, location, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Sensors LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, reading FROM Sensors WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, location FROM Devices WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT type_name FROM DeviceTypes;
SELECT value, status FROM Readings WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY reading_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM Sensors GROUP BY device_id, sensor_type;
SELECT device_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM Devices LEFT JOIN Sensors ON Devices.device_id = Sensors.device_id GROUP BY device_name, location;
SELECT r.sensor_id, r.value, r.status, s.sensor_type FROM Readings r JOIN Sensors s ON r.sensor_id = s.id WHERE r.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT d.device_name, dt.type_name, COUNT(s.id) AS total_sensors FROM Devices d JOIN DeviceTypes dt ON d.device_id = dt.type_id LEFT JOIN Sensors s ON d.device_id = s.device_id GROUP BY d.device_name, dt.type_name;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY max_value DESC;
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE TIMESTAMP >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_value DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.location = locations.location_id;
SELECT sensor_name, alert_type, alert_message FROM sensors JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id WHERE alerts.alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 50;
